title: Instructional Methodology for Using Manipulative Materials in Mathematical Problem Solving

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts and foundational knowledge of educational curricula
context.additional_context: Course focusing on developing pre-service teachers' proficiency in using manipulatives and fostering positive attitudes during mathematical problem-solving processes

learning_goals: Learners enhance their ability to select and apply manipulatives to solve various mathematical problems.
Learners can analyze and explain the pedagogical effectiveness of manipulatives in the mathematical problem-solving process.
Learners develop confidence and a positive attitude toward mathematical problem-solving.

resources: Diverse Mathematical Manipulatives (Blocks, Geometric Shapes, Measurement Tools, etc.)
Online Learning Platform or LMS (Learning Management System)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
